text: Cream softened cream cheese. Add vanilla and mix well. Don't worry about the brown color-if you mix it well enough, it should be gone. Add the condensed milk slowly. Scrape the can to get all of the condensed milk out, you'd be surprised by how much is left in the can without scraping it out. Now, with a wooden spoon, get all of the mixture thoroughly mixed together. Prepare for the last ingredient. Finally, add the lemon juice slowly. Beat the mixture together with an electric mixer and get your crust ready. Slowly pour the mixture into the crust, and when you are done scrape the bowl down. You can smooth the top over with a flat wooden spoon, and add fresh fruit or top it off with chocolate. Cover the crust and place it in the fridge for 4 hours and 30 minutes.  Enjoy!
